price: 2. Wuxuu Ogyahay waxa gala arlada iyo waxa ka soo baxa iyo waxa ka soo dega samada iyo waxa kor ugu baxa. Waana Naxariis Badanaha, Denbi Dhaafka Badan.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā yaliju fī al-arḍi wamā yakhruju min'hā wamā yanzilu mina al-samāi wamā yaʿruju fīhā wahuwa al-raḥīmu al-ghafūru
